\usepackage{tcolorbox}

\usepackage{fancyhdr}
% Set up the fancy header
\pagestyle{fancy}
\fancyhf{} % Clear default header/footer
\fancyhead[L]{\leftmark} % Left header: current section name
\fancyhead[R]{Page \thepage} % Right header: page number
\usepackage{ocgx2}

\newtcolorbox{QA}{
  colback=shallowBlue,       % Background color
  colframe=deepBlue,         % Frame color
  fonttitle=\bfseries,       % Title font
  rounded corners,           % Rounded corners
  boxrule=1pt,               % Border thickness
  left=15pt, right=15pt,     % Horizontal padding
  top=10pt, bottom=10pt,     % Vertical padding
  before skip=10pt,          % Space before the box
  after skip=10pt,           % Space after the box
}
% Define the styles for question and answer environments
\newtheoremstyle{myquestionstyle} % Style for questions
{3pt}    % Space above
{3pt}    % Space below
{\normalfont} % Body font
{0cm}    % Indent amount
{\rmfamily\bfseries} % Head font
{}       % Punctuation after theorem head
{1em}    % Space after theorem head
{{\color{orange}\thmname{#1}~\thmnumber{#2}}\thmnote{\,--\,#3}} % Theorem head spec

\newtheoremstyle{myanswerstyle} % Style for answers
{3pt}    % Space above
{3pt}    % Space below
{\normalfont} % Body font
{0cm}    % Indent amount
{\rmfamily\bfseries} % Head font
{}       % Punctuation after theorem head
{1em}    % Space after theorem head
{{\color{deepGreen}\thmname{#1}~\thmnumber{#2}}\thmnote{\,--\,#3}} % Theorem head spec

\theoremstyle{myquestionstyle}
\newmdtheoremenv[linewidth=1pt,backgroundcolor=shallowOrange,linecolor=orange,leftmargin=0pt,innerleftmargin=20pt,innerrightmargin=20pt,]{question}{Question}[section]

\theoremstyle{myanswerstyle}
\newmdtheoremenv[linewidth=1pt,backgroundcolor=shallowGreen,linecolor=deepGreen,leftmargin=0pt,innerleftmargin=20pt,innerrightmargin=20pt,]{answer}{Answer}[section]

\definecolor{shallowOrange}{rgb}{1.0, 0.9, 0.8}
\definecolor{orange}{rgb}{1.0, 0.5, 0.0}
\definecolor{shallowGreen}{rgb}{0.9, 1.0, 0.9}
\definecolor{deepGreen}{rgb}{0.0, 0.5, 0.0}
\definecolor{shallowBlue}{rgb}{0.9, 0.9, 1.0}
\definecolor{deepBlue}{rgb}{0.0, 0.0, 0.5}
